title: The Today show's Richard Wilkins flies economy with son Christian
text:
His former Today show colleague Karl Stefanovic is known to always fly business or first class.

And Richard Wilkins, 65, looked less than impressed in economy, while on a flight with his son 'Prince' Christian Wilkins over the weekend.

In two now-deleted photos shared to Instagram Stories by the 24-year-old, the entertainment editor described the experience as 'compact'.

'It's compact': The Today show's Richard Wilkins (pictured), 65, looked a little cramped while flying economy, in a photo shared to Instagram Stories by son Christian over the weekend

In one photo, Richard looked every inch the celebrity interviewer in a black T-shirt, suit jacket and sunglasses.

He added a gold crucifix necklace and his trademark hair was slicked back in a voluminous fashion.

Christian captioned the photo, '"compact" - Richard Wilkins on economy class'.

Captured: Christian, 24, posted two photos of his famous father, alongside the caption: ''compact'' - Richard Wilkins on economy class'

Hilarious: Christian later shared another photo of Richard, this time of the back of his head, and with the caption: 'Happy to report Richard Wilkins is back in his comfort zone'

A second shot with the same caption saw a rather unimpressed Richard gazing out the window of the plane.

However it appears Richard got somewhat of an upgrade, with Christian posting another shot to Instagram of his famous father in a different seat.

The photo that saw only the back of Richard's head was captioned: 'Happy to report Richard Wilkins is back in his comfort zone'.

Quick trip: It was only a domestic flight with Richard, Christian and Virginia Burmeister (all pictured), having attended the Australian Commercial Radio Awards in Brisbane

Sighting: In December last year, photos obtained by Daily Mail Australia saw Richard (pictured) flying economy in Mexico

Luggage: Richard was seen putting his own luggage into the overhead compartment on a flight scheduled for Sydney

It was only a domestic flight with Richard, Christian and Virginia Burmeister having attended the Australian Commercial Radio Awards in Brisbane on Saturday night.

In December last year, photos obtained by Daily Mail Australia saw Richard flying economy in Mexico.

Jetting back home from Karl Stefanovic's wedding to Jasmine Yarbrough, the TV presenter appeared downcast after a weekend of VIP treatment at the nuptials.
description: His former Today show colleague Karl Stefanovic is known to always fly business or first class.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
